Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (Path.StartsWith ("..\\"' StringComparison.Ordinal)) {  	Path = ParentDirectory + Path.Right (Path.Length - 2);  } else if (Path.StartsWith (".\\"' StringComparison.Ordinal)) {  	Path = BaseDirectory + Path.Right (Path.Length - 1);  } else if (Path.StartsWith ("~\\"' StringComparison.Ordinal)) {  	Path = BaseDirectory + Path.Right (Path.Length - 1);  }
The following statement contains a magic number: Path = ParentDirectory + Path.Right (Path.Length - 2);
